titleInfo.title: Morris and Harry Berry Delivering Groceries in the 1913 Blizzard

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#426 Morris and Harry Berry delivering groceries - 1913 Blizzard.'' On back of photograph: ''Morris Berry on horse. Harry Berry on sled. Delivering groceries during blizzard of 1913 #426.''

mods.abstract: Morris and Harry Berry deliver groceries by horse-drawn sled during the 1913 blizzard in Denver, Colorado. Morris Berry later married Hannah Shwayder.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
